snippet: Analysts see continued economic success for the region — and for investors who keep money there for the long haul.
abstract: Analysts forecast continued economic success for Latin America, and for investors who keep their money in those markets for the long haul.
lead_paragraph: Analysts see continued economic success for the region — and for investors who keep money there for the long haul.

headline.seo: Latin American Stocks Aim for a New Decade of Gains
headline.main: Latin American Markets Aim for a New Decade of Gains
headline.print_headline: Latin American Markets Aim for a New Decade of Gains
